extendedInfo.description: Myron had one wish for his birthday- The Foster 5000 shortwave radio.  He wanted to spend his nights listening to the world.  What he didn't expect was to listen to its end.Night of the Sky PeopleKyle OwensGenre: Sci-FiWord Count: 3,074 Word Count Short StoryEnd of the World, adventure, Sci-Fi, science fiction,  Books to Go Now, eBook Publsiher, ebook, fantasy, aliens,  Droid, authors, short stories, short story, author, writers, writing,  Amazon,  PDF, wwwbookstogonow.com, digital publisher, Seattle, story, stories, ebook, e-book, pdf, lit, html, publish,
